'''Otogi "Kintake" Fence''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Otogi "Kintake" Fence is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest west of the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Autake Plains]] on Tsurumi Island.
